title: Lebanon Prime Minister Saad Hariri resigns saying he has 'reached a dead end'
text:
Lebanon's Prime Minister Saad Hariri has resigned from his post, conceding he has "reached a dead end".

The leader said on Tuesday he would be tendering his resignation with the President in Baabda, adding that it was the political parties' responsibility to protect the country.

Announcing that he is standing down, Hariri said that while "positions come and go", the "dignity and safety of the country is more important".

The resignation comes against the backdrop of days of violent protests in Lebanon.

Citizens were seen celebrating in the street as the news filtered through.
description: Lebanon's Prime Minister Saad Hariri has resigned from his post, conceding he has "reached a dead end".
